name: fullstack-development-assistant
description: Full-stack development plugin with agents for frontend, backend, database, and DevOps integration
author: Claude Code

commands.name: learn
commands.description: Start a guided learning path for any developer role

commands.name: explore-roles
commands.description: Explore and compare all 65+ developer roles

commands.name: assess
commands.description: Assess your current knowledge and get personalized recommendations

commands.name: recommend
commands.description: Get role recommendations based on your skills and interests
